name: Amalgamate
description:
Amalgamate is a 2D Top-Down adventure game where you play as an abandoned half human, half monster child. Your goal is to reunite the human and monster communities through various quests. 
Explore the two communities and visit various gorgeous locations on your adventure. You'll meet plenty of unique and charismatic characters on your way each giving you a quest to complete that will gradually increase the trust between the two communities. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls 
WASD Keys: Move
E: Interact  
SHIFT: Run
ESCAPE : Pause/Menu
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Install Instructions 
Extract the contents of the downloaded file and run the .exe found inside.
